attributes.action: Ban on the production of eggs from battery-farms
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition would seek Her Majesty's Government to consider the total ban on production, sale, import and export of eggs in the United Kingdom that have been produced from any fowl in cruel and unnatural circumstances. Such circumstances would include battery farms and caged production and any other than the suggestion that follows.
This e-petition would seek to replace this inhumane system with free-range eggs only, every citizen can observe that such produce is always much larger, natural and healthy.
